src.models package

Module contents

Models package for the Lost and Found Application.

This package defines the domain objects used throughout the application backend. At present it includes the Item model and the associated ValidationError exception used when invalid data is supplied. The package is designed to be lightweight and decoupled from any particular persistence layer or web framework, making it easy to import wherever the core business logic needs access to the item representation.

The public API exposed by this package is:

class src.models.Item(name: str, category: str, date: str, location: str, status: str, contact_info: str)[source]

Bases: object

Represents a lost or found item.

str

date

The date the item was lost or found (YYYY-MM-DD).

Type:

str

location

Where the item was lost or found.

Type:

str

status

The current status of the item.

Type:

str

contact_info

Contact information of the person reporting.

Type:

str
